channel.title: Comments on: GLIDER CADET Electric Scooter for Kids

item.title: By: chitown momo
item.dc:creator: chitown momo
item.description: my 9 yo loves it. a manual brake would be nice, but it doesn't go too fast so I'm not worries.
item.content:encoded: my 9 yo loves it. a manual brake would be nice, but it doesn’t go too fast so I’m not worries.

item.title: By: stevenmiller
item.dc:creator: stevenmiller
item.description: scooter goes pretty fast and the green color is very cool
item.content:encoded: scooter goes pretty fast and the green color is very cool

item.title: By: Jon C
item.dc:creator: Jon C
item.description: still too cold to take it outside (Michigan weather) but our daughter is using it all over the house! the cat is terrified of it!
item.content:encoded: still too cold to take it outside (Michigan weather) but our daughter is using it all over the house! the cat is terrified of it!

item.title: By: Michelle
item.dc:creator: Michelle
item.description: I got a red cadet for my son, and he loves it! Definitely kid-sized, but works for a little mama like me :)
item.content:encoded: I got a red cadet for my son, and he loves it! Definitely kid-sized, but works for a little mama like me ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Samantha W.
item.dc:creator: Samantha W.
item.description: our youngest daughter was so jealous of her brothers glider so we bought her a pink cadet and she absolutely loves it!!! amazing products!!!
item.content:encoded: our youngest daughter was so jealous of her brothers glider so we bought her a pink cadet and she absolutely loves it!!! amazing products!!!
